authors: Elderly Mental Health Department, Oberlands Centre, Princess Elizabeth Hospital, Guernsey, St Martin, Channel Islands.
text: Commentary on: Faw M, Faw B. Neurotypical subjective experience is caused by a hippocampal simulation. WIREs Cogn Sci 2017, e1412. doi: 10.1002/wcs.1412.
title: Hippocampus as a wormhole: gateway to consciousness.
